sentences.sContent: Underneath the siding is a "splash base" to further prevent deterioration.
sentences.sContent_eng: Underneath the siding is a "splash base" to further prevent deterioration.
sentences.sCn: 在壁板下面是一个“飞溅基础”，以进一步防止恶化。

sentences.sContent: They grumbled, but it caused no obvious deterioration in their health, he says.
sentences.sContent_eng: They grumbled, but it caused no obvious deterioration in their health, he says.
sentences.sCn: 他说老人们对此抱怨，不过走一走并没怎么使他们的健康状况恶化。
